title: House Flip
description: House Flip is a simulation game where you navigate property listings, buy houses, and turn them into profits. Host an open house to gauge buyer interest and needs. Dive into mini-games to take charge of cleaning, repairing, and upgrading the house. Make strategic choices and meet buyers' demands to satisfy them and raise house prices. Time is ticking, so make sure to renovate the house wisely! Get ready to enter the exciting world of House Flip!
